creator: Technofy Apps
descriptionHtml:
The Json File Opener - Json reader allows the user to format and visualize JSON files. The JSON viewer free permits the user to format and indent JSON documents. The JSON viewer for android lets the user browse complex JSON files. The JSON viewer and editor consist of four main features; Json files, pick files, recently viewed, and converted pdf. The JSON files feature allows the user to view all the JSON files stored in the device.
The Json File Opener - Json reader permits the user to convert the JSON file into pdf with just a click. Similarly, if the user is looking for any particular JSON file, they can simply find it on the pick file feature. The user can easily browse it there. On the other hand, the recently viewed files include all the JSON files, the user has recently opened or viewed using the JSON viewer app. Finally, the converted pdf permits the user to view all the converted files in the app.
Features of Json File Opener - Json reader
1. This express format / XML file app allows the user to open/ read the JSON file. Moreover, the format express converts the JSON files into PDF.
2. The very first feature of the opener is JSON files. Through this feature, the user can view the list of all the JSON files on the phone memory. The list mentions the title of the JSON files. They can open/view the JSON file directly by clicking on it. Furthermore, this feature permits the user to delete the file directly from the app, without closing it. In addition, users can also share the JSON file with their friends and family without closing the ganhar XML.
3. The Pick file feature of JSON & XML tool - creator editor & viewer / lector de xlm lets the user browse any JSON file directly from here. This feature is exclusively for the user’s facilitation.
4. The recently viewed feature of docset viewer / JSON view authorizes the user to view all the JSON files that are recently opened/viewed by the user using lettore XML app. This feature permits the user to delete the file directly from the app, without closing it. In addition, users can also share the JSON file with their friends and family without closing the XML reader.
5. Finally, the converted pdf feature of leitor de xlm app allows the user to view all the converted pdf files without closing the JSON server app. The user can open/view any converted file directly from here.

How to Use Json File Opener - Json reader
1. The JSON XML / JSON file opener is a convenient app and is user-friendly as well. The app does not require any professional support.
2. The interface of JSON and XML tool / XML viewer has four main tabs: JSON files, pick file, recently viewed, and converted files.
3. If the user wants to view all the JSON files on their device they simply need to click on the very first tab i.e., JSON files. A list will be displayed to the user. they can open it by just clicking on it.
4. In order to convert the JSON files into pdf, they simply need to click the tab below which says convert to pdf. After that, the user is required to give a name to that converted file. The pdf converted file is then saved in the device. The user can also share or delete the file by clicking on its menu.
5. If the user wants to browse JSON files from the device, they simply need to click on the pick file tab.
6. However, if the user wants to view the recently viewed files, they can just click on the recently viewed tab. the user can also share or delete the file by clicking on its menu.
7. Finally, XML/ XML editor allows the user to view the converted pdf files in the app. Therefore, for this purpose, the user does not need to close the app and find the concerned file on the phone.
descriptionShort: Json Viewer allows the user to view/read json files and convert it into pdf.
